properties.name: City Lights Bookstore
properties.description: Posted by Paiges 261 Columbus Ave, San Francisco, CAWelcome to City Lights! Co-founded by poet/painter Lawrence Ferlinghetti, City Lights is a landmark independent bookstore and publisher that specializes in world literature, the arts, and progressive politics.

properties.name: Valencia Street Books
properties.description: Posted by Doublezy 569 Valencia Street, San Francisco, CA..., SWH, for spilling. Your art gives me strength. Wish I could\'ve made it to your reading here in April.

properties.name: William Stout Architectural Books
properties.description: Posted by Ruparc 804 Montgomery Street San Francisco, CA 94133For books, you\'ll need to go to William Stout Architectural Books near the Transamerica Pyramid. If you like design, be prepared to spend a few hours here.
